backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor canister with no functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the Promise Day page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains brief one‑line summaries for key frontend files including App, PromiseDayPage, EmojiShowerOverlay, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining color tokens, base theming, dark mode variables, and general styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Poppins font and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Simple root component that renders PromiseDayPage.
frontend/src/components/EmojiShowerOverl: Overlay component that spawns falling emoji elements, supports bursts, and adds continuous gentle rain.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login, logout, and identity loading using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Extended global CSS with romantic palette, Poppins font, emoji animations, gradient helpers, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that mounts React root and wraps it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/PromiseDayPage.tsx: Main greeting page with hero emoji, themed card, photos, message text, and click-triggered emoji bursts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, existing features, and new feature requests for a Promise Day single‑page greeting site with specific layout and animation requirements.
